## WCH\_TOKEN\_REDUX\_STORE variable

Injection token for the redux store

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
WCH_TOKEN_REDUX_STORE: InjectionToken<ReduxRootStore<Record<string, any>, import("redux").AnyAction>>
```
